# saturation

**Instance Property**

An adjustment factor to apply to the overall color saturation of the rendered scene.

## Declaration

```swift
var saturation: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

A value of `1.0` (the default) leaves scene colors unchanged. Greater values result in oversaturated colors, and a value of `0.0` makes the rendered scene entirely grayscale.

To enable this behavior, you must first enable the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNCamera/wantsHDR] setting.

## Adjusting Rendered Colors

- **contrast**: An adjustment factor to apply to the overall visual contrast of the rendered scene.
- **colorGrading**: A texture for applying color grading effects to the entire rendered scene.
